Package it.unicam.cs.formula1.app.RaceDisplay

Interface RaceDisplay

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultRaceDisplay
public interface RaceDisplay
Interface representing the display for the race. Provides methods to display the track, update bot positions, and create visual elements for the bots and track.
